title: Information Minister, Special Assistant call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 28 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz and Special Assistant on Information
Lt. Gen. (Retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa Tuesday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan, said PM office
media wing in a press release.
